name: io.github.umbraco/Umbraco-CMS-MCP-Dev
description: A developer focused model context protocol (MCP) server for Umbraco CMS

environmentVariables.description: Base URL of your Umbraco instance
environmentVariables.name: UMBRACO_BASE_URL

environmentVariables.description: Comma-separated list of tool collections to include (e.g., document,media,document-type)
environmentVariables.name: UMBRACO_INCLUDE_TOOL_COLLECTIONS

environmentVariables.description: Enable readonly mode to disable all write operations (create, update, delete). Only read and query tools remain available.
environmentVariables.name: UMBRACO_READONLY
